Jim breathed a sigh of relief realizing he wasn’t stuck as a 2 year old girl, “Thank god! I thought my powers were lost! This is pretty cool! Now I can control my transformation powers!” Jim reached back to take out the earrings to test his powers with them removed. He struggled to undo the earrings and said, “How do I take these earrings out?”

Sara giggled, “They are child proof! They are designed like that so girls your age don’t accidentally take them out!!”

Jim laughed, “That’s probably a good thing for a normal girl. Can you take them out please so I can turn back to normal before we leave for the cruise?”

Sara laughed and replied, “What’s the fun in that? Samantha thinks she has a new little sister! You need to stay like his for the entire cruise or she will know something is up!”

Jim’s eyes got wide, “The entire cruise? That’s 2 weeks? You want me to stay like this for 2 weeks? Do you realize how many diaper changes that is going to be?”

Sara laughed, “With Samantha helping me, it shouldn’t be that bad. Like I said before, I want to make sure you have a relaxing vacation! That means having absolutely no responsibilities!”

Jim laughed, “I hope you know what you are doing!”

1552311111.content:
Two days into the cruise, Jim was starting to wonder how long Sara was going to make him keep the earrings in. As long as he was wearing the earrings, Jim’s magical powers were useless and he was stuck as the 2 year old ‘Abby.’ Jim had to admit though, the cruise was relaxing. He mostly spent the days wading in the pool with Samantha. Samantha loved having a younger sister to play with. Wearing a swim diaper took some getting used to. He tried convincing Sara that the swim diapers weren’t necessary. He could always just tell her when he needed to go. Sara told ‘Abby’ they were required by the cruise line for all kids his age. There was no way of getting out of wearing them.

During the evenings, they would go to a restaurant on the cruise liner and have dinner as a family. Abby of course had to always sit in a high chair and wear a bib so she didn’t get her dress dirty.

After 4 days of pretending to be Abby, Jim pulled Sara aside and whispered, “What do you think about taking my earrings out? I could use my magic powers to become my normal self and we could have some fun!”

Sara shook her head, “Nice try! I’m not taking your earrings out. We couldn’t risk Samantha seeing her father walking around the ship.” Sara thought for a moment and explained, “Even if you turned back to normal, we didn’t pack any of your clothes. What’s the matter? I thought you agreed to this? Aren’t you having fun as Abby?“

Jim whispered back, “I’m having fun in this body. It’s been relaxing having no responsibilities. I was just suggesting a break for an evening or a few hours so we could have some ADULT fun…”

Sara thought about it. It would be nice to have some adult fun. She was still wondering what clothing Jim would wear if he changed back to normal. Just then, a group of Drag Queens walked by. Jim whispered, “..There are so many of them on this ship! I had no idea crossdressing was so popular on cruises?”

Sara then giggled, “That’s it!”

Jim asked, “Huh?”

Sara smiled, “That’s a perfect idea! Use your magic to turn back into your normal male body. However, you are going to need to make some slight adjustments. Make sure to give yourself shaven legs and make your feet the same size as mine so you can fit into my shoes. Also, lose a few inches so you aren’t so tall!”

Jim was shocked, “What? You want me to join these freaks and crossdress on the cruise?”

Sara nodded, “It will be fun! There are so many crossdressers around here that nobody will notice. That way, you will have your male equipment so we can have some fun tonight! Samantha wanted to eat with some friends she met tonight. You wouldnt have to risk being seen in drag by your daughter!”

Jim considered his options. If he turns back into his male body, he will have to crossdress. On the other hand, he could just stay as the 2 year old Abby.

15523111111.content:
Jim needed a break from being the 2 year old Abby. He figured it was worth crossdressing to spend a night with his male equipment.

Sara took the earrings out of the ears of little ‘Abby.’ Moments later, Jim used his magical powers to grow back into his normal male body. After being a 2 year old girl for the past few days, Jim felt his penis like it was the first time.

Sara instructed Jim, “Ahem..If you are going to fit into my shoes and clothes, you are going to have to make some adjustments..”

Jim dropped his height down a few inches so he was barely taller than Sara now. He grabbed a pair of Sara’s heels and made his feet to a perfect match. Sara was pleased, “Now change your face to look like another man. We don’t want to risk your daughter seeing you in drag around the ship.”

Jim chose to make his face as a man with barely any facial hair. It would be easier to crossdress without having to shave. Sara got to work on doing Jim’s makeup. The intent was to make Jim cute, but not fully a woman. There were so many crossdressers on the ship that he would fit in well.

Jim slipped into one of Sara’s dresses. With his smaller male frame, the dress fit perfectly. His hairy arms and legs looked out of place. He used his magic to remove any hair. The next problem was a wig. They didn’t have a wig for Jim. Sara had an idea and told Jim to make his hair look long and curly so it appeared as a wig. Jim was careful not to make perfect female hair. When he finished, his hair looked like a clumsy female wig.

Sara pointed to the bulge in the front of Jim’s dress. Sara grabbed a pair of tights and panties and told him to ‘tuck’ his male parts. With the tights, it would help keep things in place. Jim quickly realized that tucking was very painful. He could barely walk without his penis squeezing in-between his legs. Not wanting to be sore all night, Jim didn’t tell Sara, but he changed his crotch into a vagina. It was a feeling of relief not having anything to ‘tuck.’ He could always use his powers later to get it back.

Jim stood in the mirror with a grin. He looked like a drag queen. He would fit in perfect with the others on the ship and be able to have some adult fun later this evening.

Sara giggled, “You look great. But what kind of drag queen would you be if you didn’t have earrings?” Sara held up two large loopy earrings. Sara said, “Unfortunately, I don’t have any clip-ons. So you are going to have to give yourself pierced ears to wear these.

Jim agreed and used his power to pierce his ears. He waited for Sara to put the large loopy earrings in. However, the earrings she put in didn’t feel large. Sara explains, “On second thought, those cute earrings you were wearing as ‘Abby’ actually look better with your dress!” Jim heard the earrings snap and latch into place. Sara giggled, “These will also keep you safe from accidentally losing your power.” Jim knew with those special earrings in, his powers were useless. He didn’t have the dexterity as a 2 year old to take them out. He hoped his adult fingers would be able to figure out the difficult latching system so he could eventually give himself his penis back.

Jim/Abby is going to a foster home
155231112.content:
Jim was actually enjoying herself playing pretend with Samantha when Sara returned. She looked very upset. She picked up Jim and said to Samantha, "Honey, there is something wrong. I need you to go to your room and stay there a while please." Samantha could tell how upset her mom was, so she did not argue.

When Samantha was gone for sure, she looked at Jim/Abby and said, "We have a big problem!" She was holding back tears. "I tried to go to somebody to try to get papers for you for our trip." She sobbed, then regained control, "But it was part of a police sting. When they knew I was looking for false papers for a two-year-old girl, they arrested me. I had to say something, so I told them that someone dropped you off at the door, and I loved you so much that I wanted to keep you, so I was trying to get the papers." She cried a while then said, "They promised not to charge me as long as I turned you over to Children's Services and that you were okay." She sobbed again, "They are just outside of the door. I asked for time to say goodbye to you! Jim! What are we going to do?"

Jim/Abby was shocked, "I need to change back to my male self now! Undress me quick!"

Sara shook her head, "We can't do that! Don't you see? If I don't turn over a little girl, then I go to jail. Worse, she was in our house, and she will be missing, so you and even Samantha will also be held responsible for her disappearance!"

Jim/Abby could see her predicament. "Okay, then you need to turn me over to them as I am. Cover for me as long as you can at work, and if I can't escape soon enough, write a resignation for me. Make up some terrible, personal tragedy that caused me to leave or something. When I do escape, I will call you. Okay?" She hugged Sara, "I love you." She sighed, "You might as well call them in."

A stern looking woman and two police officers came in. Jim/Abby clung to Sara as long as she could. She fought the idea of leaving the way a child her age might, kicking and screaming as she cried out, "No! I want my mommy!" Reaching for a crying Sara. When all was taken care of, she was carried out by the strange woman, to the police car, then strapped into a very uncomfortable car seat.

There was no chance to escape as she was taken to the hospital for an examination. Some of it was extremely humiliating to Jim/Abby because they had to check to see if she had been sexually abused. Once that was done, she was taken to a care facility for orphaned children her age. There she was put into a crib that was too deep to climb out of. Not that it mattered. She could see that there were at least two security camera watching the children. She could hardly transform with someone watching, not to mention having it taped! It was not until she knew she was stuck for a while that she sat down, and only then did she realize that she was still holding Samantha's doll! She must have had it, holding her the whole time! She hugged it tight. It was Samantha's, and she would care for it as good as she could. She named the doll Samantha, and thought of her daughter every time she hugged the doll.

A week passed, and Jim/Abby could not find a way to get out! She had not anticipated just how constantly they would watch young children. She was never without either an adult in the room, or at the very least, camera's watching her!

When Ms. Crandall came in one morning and picked her up saying, "Come on Abby. There is someone who wants to meet you." She hoped it would change her circumstances enough to escape! She needed to get back to herself before this body became her default body!

155232.content:
“Hmmm. I need to think about this some more first!”

Sara nods, “Suit yourself!”

Just then, the front door opens and your daughter Samantha comes in. She has a few bags of clothes from the store. Samantha smiles, “I’m ready for the cruise tomorrow! I bought a new swimsuit and some outfits!”

Being the good father Jim was, he immediately stopped Samantha, “Not so fast young lady! Let me see your new clothes!”

Samantha rolled her eyes, “You are always so protective of me daddy! These clothes look cute on me! I promise!”

Jim pulled out Samantha’s new swimsuit and almost had a heart attack, “Are you serious? You can’t wear this!”

Samantha tried to protest, “I’m 16 Daddy! I have the body to fit things like this! You are going to have to get used to it!”

Jim was mad. He used his transformation powers and morphed into Samantha. Samantha shook her head, “You know I hate it when you transform into me Daddy! It’s just weird!“

Jim explained, “I’m just proving a point honey!“ He grabbed Samantha’s new swimsuit and pulled it on. He took a few steps and said, “Take a good look! This swimsuit barely covers anything on your body!“

Samantha tried to explain herself, “I’ll wear my new sundress over it! I promise!“

Jim grabbed the sundress and pulled it over his head. He stood in the mirror to see what Samantha would look like in the outfit. Jim told her, “I’ll agree with this sundress. But you are not wearing this swimsuit alone on the cruise!“

Samantha stormed up to her room like any mad teenager.

Sara jumped in, “I hope you are happy Jim! Samantha shopped all day for that swimsuit! You have no idea how hard it is to be a teenage girl!“

Jim pointed down to his body, “This sundress is ok. The swimsuit underneath is way to revealing! I cant have my daughter…..“

Just then, the front door opened. Samantha’s boyfriend Josh walked in. Josh smiled, “Hi Samantha! You look great!” Josh moved in for a kiss.

Jim was stuck. He couldn’t transform now. Josh thought he was really Samantha. Jim gave a fake smile to Samantha’s boyfriend and said, ’Uhh….Thanks…” On the inside, Jim was furious at Josh. Josh was the high school football jock who was trying to get into his daughter’s panties. Having to pretend to be Samantha for the time being, Jim stood paralyzed as Josh pecked his lips.

Sara looked on giggling seeing Jim stuck in the prediciment.

Josh grabbed (who he thought was his girlfriend) by the waist and said, “Come on Samantha! The movie starts in 15 minutes!”

Jim quickly replied, “Uhh…I need to go upstairs quick. I forgot my….uh….purse!” Jim knew he could buy some time and run upstairs to let the real Samantha go on her date.

Sara was mad at Jim for being such an overprotective father and jumped in, “Samantha sweetie! Your purse is right here!” Sara handed Jim Samantha’s purse. Before Jim knew what was happening, he was being escorted out the door by Josh!

Sara winked, “Have fun you two!”

info.brief_description: You have the ability to transform yourself but must transform at least one time a day.
info.description:
Well hello everybody.
Let me introduce you to this interactive story.

The main character is Jim Brown, a nice guy, about 36 years old. Short brown hair, blue eyes.
He is married with Sara Brown, a hot women, about 35 years old. Blonde hair and brown eyes.
They have a daughter, Samantha Brown, she is 16 years old. long brown hair and brown eyes.

You have an almost ordinary life. Working for an big concern as inventor of new medicines against aging.
Sara works at the same concern as a secretary and your daughter studies in a nearby college.
You have a small house in one of these beautiful suburbs, two cars and almost everything you need.
Well surely holidays are difficult. it's to expensive so you save money for your dream, a world cruise.

One day you make an mistake at your laboratory. Some chemicals and your lunch get in contact with each other without you recognizing it. with your lunch your life changed. You get ill for 2 days and then you find out about your new ability. You can transform yourself into inanimate and animate things like animals. You will learn that you need to transform at least once a day, otherwise a fever hits you and you possibly die if you didn't transform or even worser, you would not be able to transform yourself back

Your wife has find out about your ability, but Sam doesn't know a thing.

Sara was it who comes up with an idea. Thanks to your transformation skill they would be able to realize the dream, a world cruise. The money needed for you could be safed if you travel transformed. You wouldn't need a big room or two. everything would be cheaper.

Well so far..

Let's get into the action. Plz add. don't be shy.
Almost everything is allowed.
